Guard Renfad:
There are many famous heroes in the Town of Gludio, and, though he may not be a hero himself, Lord Baron Lewin Waldner is the one I respect the most.
He rebuilt the underdeloped city by hiring Dwarven artisans, and maintained the trading on the southern shore. The Gludio territory could have been developed like this too, if only others had his drive.
